description: Updates the raw content of an in-transit email message, in MIME format. This example describes how to update in-transit email message. For more information and examples for using this API, see Updating message content with AWS Lambda.

parameters.name: messageId
parameters.description: The identifier of the email message being updated.

parameters.name: content
parameters.description: Describes the raw message content of the updated email message. The S3 reference of an email message. The S3 bucket name. The S3 key object name. objectVersion (string) --- If you enable versioning for the bucket, you can specify the object version.

nested_params.name: s3Reference
nested_params.description: The S3 reference of an email message.

nested_params.name: objectVersion
nested_params.description: If you enable versioning for the bucket, you can specify the object version.
